name: Enter the Wrecking Bowl
description:
Enter the Wrecking Bowl is a local multiplayer fighting game starring monster trucks with wrecking balls! Players control the truck and mechanical arm, use physics to deliver the highest possible damage to the other player.

Controls:

The game MUST be played with 2 xbox360 controllers.
Left Analog - Move truck
A Button - Dash forward
Bumpers - Rotate lower part of the arm
Triggers - Rotate upper part of the arm

ETWB was created during a game jam by a team of 7 people:

Game Design:
Guillermo Badaracco

Art:
Guillermo Badaracco
Julián Carro
Marcos Casarino
Agostina Ravera

Programming:
Manuel de Armas
Naiaro Apecech
Juan Rodriguez

Sound:
Juan Rodriguez

Music:
www.bensound.com

Thanks for playing!
